extends Unit

       throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Creates a new Player.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The player's inventory

      • setInventory

        public void setInventory(java.util.ArrayList<Item> newInventory)
        Sets the player's inventory
        Parameters:
        newInventory - The player's new inventory

      • move

        public void move(World world,
                 double dir_x,
                 double dir_y,
                 double delta)
        Move the player in a given direction. Prevents the player from moving outside the map space, and also updates the direction the player is facing.
        Parameters:
        world - The world the player is on (to check blocking).
        dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).

      • render

        public void render()
        Draws the player on the screen based on its x and y coordinates.

      • revive

        public void revive()
        Revives the player. Resets the player's status, hp, damage, and position

      • addToInventory

        public void addToInventory(Item item)
        Adds the item to the player's inventory
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added to the player's inventory
